articles.title: Trixie Chua, founder of Singapore sustainable fashion brand Dear Samfu - Channel NewsAsia
articles.description: Could grandma’s fashion sensibilities be the answer to the massive wastage of fast fashion? Trixie Chua, founder of sustainable fashion brand Dear Samfu thinks so. CNA Women speaks to her in this instalment of our women in sustainability series.
